main_content: Evelyn Tran Interdisciplinary academic, bioscience researcher, and multi-sport athlete relentlessly using entrepreneurship to create value in the world. This platform implemented mentor-mentee-shared blog posts and mentee outreach video-sharing features to enable users to share their entrepreneurial pursuits through ... more Experience Researcher · Employee @UC Berkeley FAVE Lab May '23 - Present (1 year 10 months) CEO @WerkerBee Inc.
